    • Package Managers

    Bootstrap⌁

    Shim repository for Bootstrap.

    This package just provides the basic Bootstrap JavaScript in the package. This means that although the stylesheets are there, you will be required to provide your own means of including the styles.

    Package Managers⌁

    • Bower: components-bootstrap
    • Component: components/bootstrap
    • Composer: components/bootstrap
